original_title: De Longe, Ninguém Vê o Presidente
overview: In the same place where he built his political career, ex-President Lula speaks for the last time before being arrested, on April 7, 2018. At the same time, 10 new trucks leave a Mercedes-Benz assembly line with fewer and fewer workers.
title: De Longe, Ninguém Vê o Presidente
